mapper.select: select * from basket join game on basket.gameNum = game.gameNum join (select * from image where isimg = 'M' and isdel = 'N') as img on game.gameNum = img.gameNum where id = #{user.id} and game.isdel = 'N' and basket.isdel = 'N' order by basket.basketNum desc;

select * from buy join game on buy.gameNum = game.gameNum join (select * from basket where isdel = 'N' and basket.id = #{user.id}) as basket on game.gameNum = basket.gameNum where buy.id = #{user.id} and game.isdel = 'N' group by game.gameNum order by buy.buyNum desc;
mapper.update: update basket set isdel = 'Y' where basket.gameNum = #{tmp.gameNum} and basket.id = #{tmp.id};
